data.title: Lin Rui-Hua
data.text:
JOURNALS

Institutional Origins of Weak Associations: Taiwanese Business Associations in the Yangtze and Zhu River Delta, Taiwanese Political Science Review, Vol. 11, No. 2 (Dec., 2007), pp. 93-171 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu, TSSCI)

Economic Interests and Identity Shift: A Comparative Study of Korean and Taiwanese Investors in China, East Asian Studies, Vol. 39, No. 1 (Jan., 2008), pp. 165-192 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu)

BOOKS & BOOK CHAPTERS

Economic Interests and Identity Shift: A Comparative Study of Korean and Taiwanese Investors in China; in A Comparative Study on the Investment Strategies of Taiwanese, Japanese and Korean Businessmen in China, ed. Chen, Te-Sheng (Taipei: INK, 2008), pp. 123-153 (in Chinese).

CONFERENCE PAPERS

Political Consequences of Economic Integration across the Taiwan Strait, Presented at the Second Conference on Asia-Pacific Studies on the Impacts of East Asian Integration on the Development and Security of Taiwan, Chaiyi, Apr. 29, 2004 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu).

Institutional Origins of Weak Associations: Taiwanese Businessmen Associations Surrounded by State and Network, Presented at Conference on Organizational sociology research workshop, Beijing, Oct. 20-24, 2007 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu)

Volunteer Associations and Civil Society in China: Taiwanese Business Associations in Kunshan and Dongguan, Presented at Conference on Comparing the Taiwanese Investments in Dongguan and Kunshan: Social-economic Impacts and Governance Challenges, Taipei, Dec., 1-2, 2006 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu)

The Sociopolitical Implications of Economic Exchanges across the Taiwan Strait: Towards an Analytical Framework, Presented at the 2007 Conference on Political, Economic and Social Development in Taiwan and China, Taipei, Jun., 27, 2007 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu and Zeng, Yu-Jen).

Economic Interests and Identity Shift: A Comparative Study of Korean and Taiwanese Investors in China, Presented at International Conference on Comparing the Taiwanese, Japanese and Korean Investments in China, Taipei, Oct., 20-21, 2007 (in Chinese, Co-authored with Keng, Shu).
